评论详情: Size on these pants are all over the place! I ordered a small and they looked like children’s pants so then I ordered a large and they fit perfectly. Although I’m typically a xs the large fit great! So size is very off. The pants are super cute though.
I ordered an extra large and the pants was a small or, at best, a medium.
I am typically a large in pants I ordered an XL just to be safe, these pants said XL but were clearly a small. I am no longer ordering any clothes off amazon, very disappointing
I wear a size 8 pants and wanted these to fit low in my waist so I got an XL and the won’t even button. These run VERY small beware

Not as described. Not low rise and not the length stated in the charts. Very poor quality

Otherwise really well made and adorable!!!!!!!

评论概述: UPDATE: THEY SHRINK IN WASH. Like 2 inches shrink
评论详情: These may be the cutest pants i have ever owned. They fit amazing up top.. unfortunately i am 5'7... these pants are nade for somebody who is 5'5MAX. I had my daughter cut the seem out the bottom now they are just barely long enough. Thank goodness they had another seem inside. 9 pockets guys. 9 pockets. And they all work. Not decoration. Ill have to post a pic later. Bt they fit the butt great (and i dnt have much there) So if ur under 5'5 go for it! If ur over 5'7 steer clear! And if ur 5'5-5'7 and ok w rippin a seem out the bottom these are great!

评论概述: Strange fit - not true to size
评论详情: These were TIGHT in the thighs and butt (I’m not even a curvy girl) and wayy to short on me. If you really want to purchase these in particular, I would size up at least 2, but keep in mind that they may not fit your waist.
I don’t know if the product of the size wrong or I was just delivered the wrong size, but they definitely did not fit. And I couldn’t return them!!??
They were very high rise (going ABOVE my belly button) and the material is very very cheap, not denim and very thin, also I should have  sized up for sure

Cute pants but OMG there are obviously zero quality control standards at this factory. The stitching is so ridiculously sloppy with unfinished seams and thread jumps from one seam to another without any thread cutting or finishing everywhere. These are likely to fall apart after a few wears and washes. This is your typical hastily thrown together Chinese product with no care whatsoever for retaining customers. Not worth half of what they charge.
These cargo pants were adorable, super comfy on, and you can dress up or down
Qualität ist super aber die Größe stimmt überhaupt nicht

Couleur, Coupe, taille : impeccable . Seul petit bémol : longueur un peu juste.

Lieferung sauber und zügig Allerdings ist selbst beim zweiten Versuch die Größe viel zu klein ausgefallen. So klein , dass ich die Hose zurückgeben musste. Sieht gut aus, ist auch gut verarbeitet, aber hier sind asiatische Proportionen berücksichtigt. M und L sind zudem identisch, habe die Hosen extra übereinander gelegt um das zu prüfen. Was soll man da als Kunde machen?. Doof dieser Rücksendeaufwand...und bis HEUTE keine Erstattung der zweiten Hose. Geld ist futsch  19.01.25 NOCH IMMER KEIN GELD ZURÜCK
